title: The Beatles: An Illustrated Record
description: The first and only complete critical guide to all the Beatle recordings ever made — including bootlegs — with a dazzling pictorial record of their lives, loves, quarrels and lawsuits. Compiled and written by 'New Musical Express' editors Roy Carr and Tony Tyler, with over 200 illustrations, a complete diary, selected quotes and all possible recording details.
author: Roy Carr
